name: Sean T. Allen
bio: Sean is a member of the Pony core team. His turn-ons include programming languages, distributed computing, Hiwatt amplifiers, and Fender Telecasters. His turn-offs include mayonnaise, stirring yogurt, and sloppy code. He is one of the authors of [Storm Applied](http://www.manning.com/sallen/), and VP of Engineering at [Wallaroo Labs](https://www.wallaroolabs.com/).
